snippet: The political establishment has not responded well to Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani and Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei, who entered the race at the last minute.
abstract: Iranian officials issue blunt threats of violence against Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani and Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei, two last-minute registrants for June presidential election whose unwanted presence on ballot has angered country's governing establishment of Shiite Muslim clerics and Revolutionary Guard commanders.
lead_paragraph: The political establishment has not responded well to Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani and Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei, who entered the race at the last minute.

headline.seo: Presidential Candidates in Iran Are Threatened
headline.main: Iranian Officials Threaten Two Candidates for the Presidency
headline.print_headline: Iranian Officials Threaten Two Candidates for the Presidency
